fields.entryTitle: The case of the disappearing great grandmother
fields.desktopHeadline: The case of the disappearing great grandmother
fields.mobileHeadline: The case of the disappearing great grandmother
fields.desktopSummary: On 22 September 1888, a young woman gave birth to her illegitimate son in the Llanelly Union Workhouse, South Wales. A month and a half later Gwenllian registered the birth - and with that bureaucratic step completed - then she disappears from history.
fields.mobileSummary: In 1888, a young woman gave birth to her son in the Llanelly Union Workhouse. A month and a half after she registered the birth she disappears from history.
